0.cdata!:
Tunisie - Projet de Developpement Rural
            du Nord-ouest

abstracts.cdata!:
The First Phase Northwest Rural
            Development Project for Tunisia will help finance a 5-year
            time slice of the Borrower's 15-year development
            program for the Northwest region which aims to increase the
            income and improve the nutrition, health, and education of
            the population while reducing soil erosion and thereby
            arresting the decline in agricultural productivity. The
            program will also create employment possibilities, develop
            local energy resources, and reduce the sedimentation rate of
            the Sidi Salem reservoir. The project will concentrate on
            establishing the institutions which would implement the
            program, including the Office, and the extension, research,
            credit, and livestock development services. The project will
            also start up specific agricultural, soil conservation and
            forestry activities, together with productive infrastructure
            works, and would include a foreign technical assistance component.
